title: How to Fill Your Beginner Classes in 30 Days
excerpt: A simple, repeatable plan to get qualified trials through the door.
html: Start with a clear offer, a landing page with social proof, and a 2-week trial with uniform. Combine local Facebook Lead Ads with Google Local Services and retargeting. Train the phone script and follow-up cadence. Track show-up and conversion rates weekly.

title: Retention: The 4 Moments That Matter
excerpt: Fix these and your churn drops fastâ€”onboarding, week 3, belt moments, life events.
html: Design onboarding with care calls and a first stripe within 10 days. Celebrate progress publicly, and use belt moments to introduce a longer commitment. Watch attendance dips and intervene early.

title: Build a Leadership Team That Runs Without You
excerpt: Roles, cadences, and KPIs for staff so you can focus on growth.
html: Define clear roles (front desk, instructors, outreach), weekly cadences, and KPIs (trial booked, show-up rate, upgrades). Use simple SOPs and regular training blocks to uplevel the team.
